events.onFocusLost: if(self.text === '') { setControlBackground('name', '#ffe6e6'); showMessage('请输入姓名'); } else { setControlBackground('name', '#e6ffe6'); }

events.onFocusLost: if(!validateNumber(self.value.toString(), 0, 120)) { setControlBackground('age', '#ffe6e6'); self.value = 18; } else { setControlBackground('age', '#e6ffe6'); showMessage('年龄输入正确', 'info'); }

if(self.text === '') { showMessage('请输入邮箱地址', 'warning'); setControlBackground('email', '#fff3e0'); } else if(validateEmail(self.text)) { setControlBackground('email', '#e6ffe6'); showMessage('邮箱地址格式正确', 'info'); } else { setControlBackground('email', '#ffe6e6'); }
